title: Web Design and Development
overview: Web Design and Development provides learners with the knowledge and skills to build visually appealing, interactive, and functional websites. By mastering both the front-end and back-end technologies, students will be able to create fully responsive websites. This course covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, databases, and more, with a focus on real-world projects.
courseDetails: In this course, you will explore both the design and development aspects of building websites. You will learn how to create responsive layouts, interactive features, and integrate dynamic content using server-side programming. Projects will include building websites from scratch, implementing user-friendly interfaces, and using databases to store and retrieve information.
certification: Upon completing this course, you will receive a certificate, qualifying you as a certified Web Designer and Developer.

Modules.name: Introduction to Web Design and Development
Building Forms and Validations with JavaScript
Prototyping with Figma and Adobe XD
Introduction to Bootstrap for Faster Development
Version Control with Git and GitHub
Introduction to PHP for Server-Side Programming
CRUD Operations with PHP and MySQL
Introduction to APIs and RESTful Services
Introduction to React for Front-End Development
Building Single Page Applications (SPAs) with React
Using AJAX for Asynchronous Content Updates
Introduction to Web Security: Best Practices
SEO Best Practices for Web Development
Project: Build a Fully Functional Website from Scratch

Highlight.name: Database Integration with PHP and MySQL
